name: StyleCop
description: Black Marble's StyleCop test runner that use settings files in the project folders. (Using StyleCop 4.7.59.0)
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: treatStyleCopViolationsErrorsAsWarnings
inputs.label: Test Errors as Warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Treat StyleCop violations errors as warnings.

inputs.name: sourcefolder
inputs.label: Source File Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root folder to scan for project files.

inputs.name: maximumViolationCount
inputs.label: Max. Violation Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum project violations before analysis stops

inputs.name: allowableViolationCount
inputs.label: Allowable Violation Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of violations allowed before the task fails

inputs.name: forceFullAnalysis
inputs.label: Force analysis
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force complete re-analysis (ignores any cached results)

inputs.name: additionalAddInPath
inputs.label: Additional add-in path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to any custom rulesets, the directory should not be a sub directory of the current directory at runtime as this is automatically scanned

inputs.name: settingsFile
inputs.label: Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to single settings files to use (as opposed to files in project folders)

inputs.name: loggingfolder
inputs.label: Logging Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder to place the detailed text and XML formated log files

inputs.name: summaryFileName
inputs.label: Summary File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file to save the StyleCop analysis summary markdown file

inputs.name: detailedSummary
inputs.label: Detailed Summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true list all the violations, if false just the totals are shown
